headline: BofA Cuts AbbVie (ABBV) Target While Maintaining Neutral View
summary: AbbVie Inc. (NYSE:ABBV) is included among the 14 Best Pharma Dividend Stocks to Buy in 2026. On December 15, BofA lowered the firm’s price target on AbbVie Inc. (NYSE:ABBV) to $233 from $248 and kept a Neutral rating. The firm said it sees “a relatively clean setup” for growth near the top end of the […]

headline: Bank stocks: 3 themes to watch in 2026
summary: Shortly after the new year, banks will start reporting their quarterly earnings, with JPMorgan Chase (JPM) releasing its fourth quarter results on Tuesday, Jan. 13. Christopher McGratty, head of US bank research at KBW, a Stifel company, shares what he will be watching for from banks in 2026. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Gen Z may not be able to afford a house or the cost of living—but give it 10 years. They’re on track to gain $36T and become the richest generation
summary: Gen Z isn’t shy about splurging—whether it’s doom spending for a dopamine hit, spoiling their pets, or splashing out on rent. But soon they’ll actually have the financial power to afford it.

headline: Warren Buffett Is About to Retire. Should You Dump Your Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B) Stock?
summary: He’s the Oracle of Omaha and, quite possibly, the greatest living investor. Warren Buffett, the CEO of Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE:BRK-B), has rewarded Berkshire’s loyal shareholders with outstanding returns based on his value-focused stock portfolio. However, at age 95, Buffett surely knows that he can’t stay at the helm of Berkshire Hathaway forever. Thus, Buffett is about ... Warren Buffett Is About to Retire. Should You Dump Your Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B) Stock?

headline: US Consumer Credit Stress Rises: 3 Bank Stocks to Watch for Stability
summary: Rising US consumer credit stress is pressuring banks, but BAC, WFC and USB stand out with strong liquidity, improving asset quality and strategic moves.
